overview.collections.title: Project collections
overview.collections.text: I am developing software for web and mobile software services. I desire to deliver excellent, innovative digital projects completed to the highest possible standards.

overview.project.title: Content management
overview.project.text: Website service lets you easily manage the content in range of our services without understanding any programming code.

sd.header.title: Software projects
sd.overview: I especially develop applications with TypeScript, and Python in the environment of React Js / Angular, Redux Js, Django, Express / Nest Js, CSS / SCSS, and Jest testing libraries. This page is right to overview the tech development.

summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.text:
My development experience comes from setting myself specific goals to achieve and helping my friends by providing custom software tools and solutions.

Development has given me an excellent foundation of problem-solving and focus on current activities. Practicing coding and building projects together with my friends had given me a grip on the team-working.

I have always been interested in how modern applications are created and this curiosity, along with my programming steps, working at Data4you & BrikkApp, and level of studies in the field of learning programming languages has greatly influenced my present activities.

tech.title: TECH SKILLS
tech.text:
I especially develop TypeScript, and Python web applications in the environment of React Js / Angular, Redux, Django, Express / Nest Js, CSS, and Jest testing libraries. Also, I also participate in Data Science analyses, to describe the business problem and get to know the right solution.

I have the fluent knowledge to match database structures SQL and No-SQL.

languages.title: Languages
languages.text:
HTML 5, CSS 3, SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, PHP, SQL

Development

React, Angular, Redux, NestJs, Express, Django, Laravel, GIT

Testing libraries

Jest, Enzyme, Mocha, Chai

services.title: Services
services.text: Digitalocean, Heroku, Netlify, SocketIO, Google Drive API, ScreenshotMachine API, Amazon s3 Storage
